languages.text: "Все, в чьих сердцах силен огонь веры, оценят такой шаг".

traits.locale_text: "Все, в чьих сердцах силен огонь веры, оценят такой шаг".

languages.text: "All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."
languages.original_text: "Все, в чьих сердцах силен огонь веры, оценят такой шаг".

traits.locale_text: "All in whose hearts the fire of faith burns strong will appreciate this gesture."
"All in whose hearts the fire of faith burns strong will appreciate this gesture."
"All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."
"All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."
"All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."

languages.text: 「信仰の炎を心で燃やすすべての者が、この振る舞いを評価するでしょう」
languages.original_text: "All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰の炎を心で燃やすすべての者が、この振る舞いを評価するでしょう」

languages.text: “任何心怀信仰之火的人，都会赞赏您的明智之举。”
languages.original_text: "All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."

traits.locale_text: “任何心怀信仰之火的人，都会赞赏您的明智之举。”

languages.text: «Todos aquellos cuyos corazones arden con las llamas de la fe apreciarán el gesto».
languages.original_text: "All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."

traits.locale_text: «Todos aquellos cuyos corazones arden con las llamas de la fe apreciarán el gesto».

languages.text: « Ceux dont le cœur est consumé par la foi sauront apprécier votre geste. »
languages.original_text: "All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux dont le cœur est consumé par la foi sauront apprécier votre geste. »

languages.text: "Alle, in deren Herzen das Feuer des Glaubens brennt, werden diese Geste schätzen."
languages.original_text: "All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."

traits.locale_text: "Alle, in deren Herzen das Feuer des Glaubens brennt, werden diese Geste schätzen."

languages.text: "Kalplerinde iman ateşi yanan herkes, bu jesti takdir edecektir."
languages.original_text: "All whose hearts burn with the fire of faith will appreciate this gesture."

traits.locale_text: "Kalplerinde iman ateşi yanan herkes bu jesti takdir edecektir."
